lines.text: I've come here to create a new country for you called chaos, and a new government called anarchy.

[On the phone after the lethal explosion]
God damn you, Gaerity! Look what you've done!
You've got me all wrong. I'm not a destroyer... I'm a creator.
You're not a creator! You're a sick freak - it's what you are!
Two mustards, please. I like mine spicy!

[helping Lizzie turn on the stove]
Which hand do you pledge allegiance with?
I gotta tell them the truth. I gotta tell them how I tracked the terrorist, I disarmed the bomb, and I saved the day. And I'm a hero, and everybody loves a hero!

[Frightened as she sits in front of booby-trapped computer]
Whatta we gonna do?

[Needing to get access to knee hole of desk]
Got to get between your legs, Nancy.

[Looking at the food at a wake]
Would you look at this spread now! Why is it that a man always gets thrown his best party when he dies?
Know what you're looking for, lieutenant?

[to Jimmy]
Don't you ever get tired of bein' a hero?

[to Franklin]
You ain't brave, asshole. You're dumb!
